body:
Make it mixed gamemodes. Also, make it around christmas because people wont have school.

that is all

title: Next tournament

replies.body: good idea also f ix discord plz  thx
replies.body_tagged: good idea also f ix discord plz  thx

replies.body: There's a vote going on open to all community members, so you can give your opinion there regarding the gamemode(s). As for starting the tourney around Christmas, it sounds like a good idea to me!
replies.body_tagged: There's a vote going on open to all community members, so you can give your opinion there regarding the gamemode(s). As for starting the tourney around Christmas, it sounds like a good idea to me!

replies.body:
I personally am all for mixed gamemodes, however we're allowing the community to pick this tournaments gamemode, so anything can happen. 
Also, once we figure out the gamemode we will discuss dates, but in my eyes Christmas is sorta far, and I'd like to have another tm before.
replies.body_tagged:
I personally am all for mixed gamemodes, however we're allowing the community to pick this tournaments gamemode, so anything can happen. 
Also, once we figure out the gamemode we will discuss dates, but in my eyes Christmas is sorta far, and I'd like to have another tm before.

replies.body: next tournament should be rock paper scissors but we take a shot every time someone loses
